pairs.source_text: Photosynthesis is the process by which plants convert light energy into chemical energy
pairs.simple_summary: Plants make food from sunlight using chlorophyll
pairs.technical_summary: Chloroplasts utilize photons to drive ATP synthesis via the electron transport chain, converting CO2 and H2O into glucose through the Calvin cycle

pairs.source_text: Machine learning algorithms learn patterns from data to make predictions
pairs.simple_summary: AI learns from examples to make guesses about new data
pairs.technical_summary: Neural networks employ gradient descent optimization to minimize loss functions across training datasets, enabling pattern recognition through weighted feature extraction

pairs.source_text: Climate change refers to long-term shifts in global weather patterns
pairs.simple_summary: Earth's weather is changing over many years due to human activities
pairs.technical_summary: Anthropogenic greenhouse gas emissions alter radiative forcing dynamics, resulting in measurable increases in global mean surface temperature and associated climatological phenomena
